basics.name: Peter Parker
basics.summary: I am the amazing Spiderman. I do cool things like save the world from evil.

work.summary: I don’t like to brag about all the amazing experiences I’ve had so I’ll keep this section short. Besides, I like being mysterious.
The Stark internship is just a cover – up.

education.description: Average student, he belongs to the Decathlon team in which we won the national contest in NewYork, in addition to achieving the highest academic average in the history of Midtown High.
I specifically specialized in physics during his undergraduate studies, thanks to a scholarship. I was also approved for second year study in the biophysics department graduate program.
